mapper.insert: insert into post (bt_num,bc_num,p_num,p_title,p_intro,p_info,p_gname,p_capa,p_cost,p_loc,p_starttime,p_endtime,p_cstatus) values (#{bt_num},#{bc_num},(select max(p_num)+1 from post where bt_num= #{bt_num} and bc_num = #{bc_num}), #{p_title},#{p_intro},#{p_info},#{p_gname},#{p_capa},#{p_cost},#{p_loc}, #{p_starttime},#{p_endtime},#{p_cstatus})
